title: Journalists finally take state-sanctioned trolling seriously
description: When I was interviewing journalists in 2017 about strategies for covering antagonists, white supremacists, and other media manipulators, the issue of what to do about trolling loomed large. Many of the subjects these journalists were profiling employed batsignaled trolling memes and embraced various forms of shitposting, and whether or not they had direct connections to...
